mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PURCHASECNT DESC) ROWNNUM FROM SEMANYPURCHASEITEMVIEW s) WHERE ROWNNUM <= #{no} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DEADLINE ASC) ROWNNUM FROM SEDEADLINEPURCHASEDDAYVIEW s) WHERE ROWNNUM <= #{no} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distance ASC) ROWNNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(35.1310310271862)) * COS(RADIANS(#{latitude})) * COS(RADIANS(#{longitude}) - RADIANS(129.0771369881199)) + SIN(RADIANS(35.1310310271862)) * SIN(RADIANS(#{latitude}))) distance FROM SEAROUNDPURCHASEVIEW) WHERE distance <= 10)) WHERE ROWNNUM <= 5 ORDER BY ROWNNUM ASC
SELECT * FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY '${orderby}' '${sort}'
SELECT * FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE scode = #{scode} ORDER BY '${orderby}' '${sort}'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PURCHASECNT DESC) ROWN FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE scode = #{scode}) WHERE ROWN <= 6 ORDER BY purchasecnt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) purchasechk FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PURCHASENO ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) rown FROM PURCHASESTATUS p WHERE itemno = #{itemno}) WHERE rown = 1 AND state = 0
